name: KnockKnock
description:
A simple puzzle game made on the occasion of the Black&White jam.

       You are a visually impaired person who has to go and open the door for the person who knocks. Try not to hit yourself and reach the door!

Try to complete all of three levels using your memory to advance. 

Use the arrows and the space key to play 

This is the first game I made with Godot, I really enjoyed using it.

Try to beat my score

Software used :

  • Godot Engine
  • Inkscape
  • 1BitDragon
  • DragonBonesPro
  • Audacity
